text: TAKE A BREATH Matchweek 13 finished on Sunday, Matchweek 14 starts Tuesday. Here's a look back at the latest results: http://t.co/E5Epaq0IrA
"It's about seeing smiles on their faces" - @IngsDanny on his self-funded disability project: http://t.co/oH4RuT979W http://t.co/Q1lwknQWoQ
#FPL managers! You've got until 1930 GMT - exactly 12 hours - to pick your team for Gameweek 14. Do it here: http://t.co/PravMVs6bh
.@GaryLineker scored the winner when @SpursOfficial last won away at @chelseafc - back in February 1990 #CHETOT http://t.co/1pvF8Jwe4y
TEAM NEWS Gerrard returns for @LFC as do Manquillo & Lallana, in for Enrique, Allen & Coutinho while @OfficialFOXES are unchanged #LEILIV
Marouane Fellaini: "We have to continue the way we did against Hull. But Stoke have a physical presence so we have to be ready" #MUNSTK
GOAL Man Utd 1-1 Stoke (39 mins) Steven Nzonzi powers in from long range to level it up at Old Trafford #MUNSTK
GOAL Burnley 1-1 Newcastle (48 mins) Papiss Cisse turns the ball home from 6 yards to draw the Magpies level #BURNEW
GOAL Leicester 1-3 Liverpool (88 mins) Jordan Henderson slots in from Sterling's backheel after Schmeichel spilled the ball #LEILIV
Paul Lambert: "@bentekechris20 is not the finished article by any stretch, but if he keeps progressing he can be one of the best." #CRYAVL
Palace 0-1 Villa. @bentekechris20's 1st #BPL goal of the season gives Villa a 1st win in 10: http://t.co/Qetv6sgv3i http://t.co/K4JbJfdadx
Crystal Palace 0-1 Aston Villa: Matchwinner @bentekechris20 scored his first #BPL goal since 23 March #CRYAVL http://t.co/v5ecGZgI05
#BPL legend @mattletiss7 opens a new 3G pitch that will increase participation. Find out more: http://t.co/jwoZ9U4R3g http://t.co/wsiprWD2lh
TEAM NEWS Four changes for @HullCity as Rosenior, Meyler, Huddlestone & Quinn all come in while Osman replaces Eto'o for @Everton #EVEHUL
PHOTO @aguerosergiokun powers home his 13th #BPL goal of the season - putting him 2 clear of Diego Costa #SUNMCI http://t.co/YkirmVRrvN
GOAL Everton 1-1 Hull (59 mins) Substitute Sone Aluko drives past Sylvain Distin and beats Tim Howard at his near post #EVEHUL
FULL-TIME Everton 1-1 Hull. Substitute Aluko earns the visitors a point after Lukaku's opener #EVEHUL http://t.co/RVIfy1NeDE
The votes are in and Aguero is celebrating again - 59% of you would pick him over Sanchez http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/AEqw8mqKBl
.@chelseafc, @MCFC & @Arsenal were all winners on Wednesday... http://t.co/s227rBibFV
Only two #BPL goals this season have featured more passes than @stevanj35's strike against Sunderland (29) #SUNMCI http://t.co/7oxthtIX1Z
ON THIS DAY in 2011, @clint_dempsey's late goal earned @FulhamFC victory over #LFC: http://t.co/Wt0HgOaTwA http://t.co/Dcwenwt4WC
.@chazaustin9 is in the hunt for the Barclays Golden Boot but @aguerosergiokun leads the way with 14 goals for @MCFC http://t.co/2UdZ8f3Tjx
#STKARS "Let's show there that we have improved." Arsene Wenger looks ahead to Saturday: http://t.co/Fs2uiaVAUl
It's Matchday! Here's a reminder of the fixtures - check out where you can watch the matches: http://t.co/YuRA48XV0N http://t.co/3lFKhESyF6
"The atmosphere will be electric and the fans will be up for it, which should help the players" - @NUFC defender Steven Taylor #NEWCHE
SUB @chelseafc make their first change just after going behind - @Andre_Schuerrle replaces @oscar8. Newcastle 1-0 Chelsea (61 mins)
TEAM NEWS Muniesa, Walters & Crouch return for @stokecity, while Bellerin, Gibbs & Giroud come in for @Arsenal. Welbeck on the bench #STKARS
PENALTY SAVED Allan McGregor saves down low to his left from Graham Dorrans. Score remains Hull 0-0 West Brom #HULWBA
GOAL QPR 1-0 Burnley (51 mins). Charlie Austin finds Leroy Fer in the box and his shot deflects off Ben Mee and over the goalkeeper
FULL-TIME Liverpool 0-0 Sunderland. Neither side can find the breakthrough after 90 minutes at Anfield #LIVSUN http://t.co/MLO0Ezrkm2
Roberto Martinez ahead of #MCIEVE: "Our performances have been strong. We're building towards hitting our best level, that's important"
SECOND HALF We are back under way at the Etihad Stadium. Man City lead Everton 1-0 #MCIEVE

Stoke 3-2 Arsenal. @petercrouch netted after 19 seconds in a Britannia thriller. Report: http://t.co/Fs2uiaVAUl http://t.co/FrbLKgqlug
Stoke 3-2 Arsenal - five goals, a red card and a whole lot of drama at the Britannia. Report: http://t.co/Fs2uiaVAUl http://t.co/iSOsVLzwFM
Who was Saturday's Star Man in the #BPL? Head to http://t.co/w3EwiAn4W2 to vote... http://t.co/xDSGKL0blE
GOAL West Ham 0-1 Swansea (19 mins). A wonderful move culminates in Montero teeing up Bony, who slots home the opener #WHUSWA
RED CARD Swansea goalkeeper Lukasz Fabianski is dismissed on 68 mins for a foul outside his box on Diafra Sakho #WHUSWA
.@whufc_official boss Sam Allardyce: "I must mention Alex Song and the control he gives to our midfield" #WHUSWA http://t.co/9pXHlUibCl
SUB Jack Grealish replaces Tom Cleverley for @AVFCOfficial. It's Villa 1-1 Leicester after 63 mins #AVLLEI
